verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: descended] [ARG1: into a bitter Twitter tirade] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday morning] , [ARGM-ADV: blaming Montana Democratic Senator Jon Tester for paving the way for VA nominee Ronny Jackson to drop out of the running to head the troubled agency] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] descended into a bitter Twitter tirade Saturday morning , [V: blaming] [ARG1: Montana Democratic Senator Jon Tester] [ARG2: for paving the way for VA nominee Ronny Jackson to drop out of the running to head the troubled agency] .
